txt.en: You are a source of confidence to your peers.
As you travel throughout Middle-earth, you learn the customs and ways of the other races. Using that knowledge effectively makes you a better leader.
Practice your weapon-recovering strike; it could save your life...or a friend's.
In a sword-fight, it is usually a safe bet that the man without a blade is in a bad way. You, however, have learned how to hedge that bet better than most.
